page.title: 18LUSTON AREA'S CLUBS
page.content: There are numerous clubs in our area, one of them is{Luston Football Club}. They have an under 12s side, an under 14s and an under 15s and play in the Hereford League.The Cawley Hall,in Eye,is a meeting place for many clubs. The{Men's Club}who play snooker,table tennis and darts,the{Young Farmers {Club}who enter various competitions testing skills such as first aid, woodwork, craft, drama etc.and the {Women's Institute}who have speakers at their monthly meetings and also run a rounders team.The {Badminton Club}also meet there once a week.The{Friendship {Club}also use the Hall and it is also used for{Whist Drives}.The{Brownies {meet}at the school every Tuesday and apart from doing their interest badges they play games, make models and go on outings.There is also a{Bowls Team in the village who play during the summer
